Version 2.0.65 - Fix Position Bar & Resume for Basic SCORM

Bug Fixes

  • Fix position bar jumping back up after backward navigation (stale interceptor returning old tag target)
  • Fix furthest slide not restored after page refresh for Basic SCORM (furthestSlide was never tracked)
  • Fix initial default slide 1 overriding tag navigation target position

Changes

  • Disable lesson_location read interceptor when SCORM content writes a different location (user navigated naturally)
  • Track furthestSlide from forward navigation in sendProgressUpdate (not just from score.raw)
  • Store furthestSlide in sessionStorage for resume after page refresh
  • Skip initial default slide 1 when tag navigation is pending
  • Same fixes applied to both SCORM 1.2 and SCORM 2004

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.64: Fix backward nav, faster generic detection, fix tag navigation
  • v2.0.63: Fix false 100% completion, totalSlides=0 for unknown totals
